name: Dust Bunnies In Space
description:
It's been a while since Zenny last dusted the inside of her space ship.

Hopefully all those dust bunnies don't happen to come to life and clog up the ship with their dust!

If they do, at least Zenny has her wits, her jet booster and her trusty Three-Point Thingy Ring to help stop the madness in its tracks!

------

A platforming shoot-em-up that you control entirely with a mouse, made for the Construct 3 Game Jam on Newgrounds.com.

The idea's honestly rather experimental, but I'd love to continue developing this if I can!  What you get here is the downloadable version of the Game Jam build.

If you run into any bugs at all, or just want to leave your comments on the game, please feel free to let me know in the comments below!  I can't guarantee I'll be able to put out any updates, but it's all good stuff to know if I'm able to continue development of this idea.

Hope you enjoy, and thanks for checking this game out!

---Credits---

Art, Programming, The Game Making - Nick K. (Piggybank)

http://nkalmar.tumblr.com/

Music - BiTSTER

http://bitster.newgrounds.com/
